<body bgcolor="white">

<p>Provides linear and radial gradient paint classes from the 
    <a href="http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/batik/">Apache Batik</a> project.
</p>
<p>These classes are here to provide support for gradient paints which are
not present in J2SE5.
Applicatio
